purpose: To streamline and automate the analysis of multi-omic data, reducing the need for manual data processing and interpretation
principle: Leverages machine learning and bioinformatics algorithms to integrate and analyze complex biological data sets
reusability: Designed as a modular Python package, allowing integration into existing bioinformatics pipelines; includes command-line interface for ease of use
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited support for certain omics data types and lacks extensive error handling
name: AutoBA
description: An AI Agent for Fully Automated Multi-omic Analyses
highlight: Fully automates multi-omic analyses with minimal user intervention
